name: The Mourning Star demo
description:
Because App Store and Google Play are taking too long, here is the official Android demo for my upcoming game The Mourning Star! IOS version will soon be available on the App store.

In The Mourning Star, learn the ritual of a mysterious force that reincarnates the entire universe. What does that involve? In part, wielding the last star as a flail and smashing it into asteroids, of course! Each level is a star in a constellation, and each constellation has its own story to tell. Connected with all these stories is a mysterious figure in yellow. Join them on this epoch-spanning sci-fi journey!
